title: ion-list-header
body:
ListHeader a header component for a list.
Unlike ItemDivider, ListHeaders are styled to be stand-out from the rest of the list items.

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: lines
props.docs: How the bottom border should be displayed on the list header.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

docs:
ListHeader a header component for a list.
Unlike ItemDivider, ListHeaders are styled to be stand-out from the rest of the list items.

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp

styles.name: --border-color
styles.docs: Color of the list header border

styles.name: --border-style
styles.docs: Style of the list header border

styles.name: --border-width
styles.docs: Width of the list header border

styles.name: --color
styles.docs: Color of the list header text

styles.name: --inner-border-width
styles.docs: Width of the inner list header border
